Hello! My name is Ethan Lobo and I am currently a First-Year Graduate Student at the University of Texas at Dallas studying Applied Cognition and Neuroscience, specializing in Computational Models and Intelligent Systems. 

Thank you for visiting. If you're interested in my work, please feel free to explore my projects. I am always open to new ideas and collaborations!
